fpmExplorer:Page.title: Filter Bar Default Values
fpmExplorer:Page.introduction: The FilterBar building block enables you to set default values for the filter fields.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Annotation Options
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: There are two ways to annotate default filter values. Use either 'UI.SelectionVariant' or 'Common.FilterDefaultValue'. If both are defined, 'Common.FilterDefaultValue' will be ignored.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Setting Flexible Values via Controller
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: Annotations cannot set flexible values (Semantic Operators) as default values. To achieve this, use a controller implementation.
